children.sentence: Abigail Zebedee a girl born on .

recitals: This is an  occupation & non-molestation orders made against the respondent Bluto  Thuggo on  26 January 2025 by Deputy District Judge Campbell on the application of the applicant Joan  Rivers
This order was made at a hearing on notice to the respondent.
undertakings: The statement of service of this order on the respondent shall be filed at court and shall be in a form which complies with section 9 of the Criminal Justice Act 1967 and shall include the following signed declaration:'This statement is true tot he best of my knowledge and belief and I make it knowing that, if it were tendered in evidence, I would be liable for prosecution if I wilfully stated in it anything which I know to be false or did not believe to be true'
orders: The court declares that the applicantJoan Rivers, has home rights in The Longlands, Berry Road, Surbiton, BM 78 PRE.

The court declares that the Joan Rivers's home rights in The Longlands, Berry Road, Surbiton, BM 78 PRE shall not end when the respondent Bluto Thuggo dies or their marriage is dissolved and shall continue until the determination of the applicant's financial provision claims or a further order is made.
The respondent, Bluto Thuggo, shall allow the applicant, Joan Rivers, to occupy the property at The Longlands, Berry Road, Surbiton, BM 78 PRE.
The respondent, Bluto Thuggo, must not occupy the property at The Longlands, Berry Road, Surbiton, BM 78 PRE
The respondent Bluto Thuggo must not use or threaten violence against the applicant Joan Rivers and must not instruct, encourage or in any way suggest any other person should do so.
The respondent Bluto Thuggo must not intimidate, harass or pester the applicant Joan Rivers  and must not instruct, encourage or in any way suggest any other person should do so.
The respondent, Bluto Thuggo, must not telephone, text, email or otherwise contact the applicant Joan Rivers, including via social networking websites or other forms of electronic messaging.

The respondent, Bluto Thuggo, must not damage, attempt to damage or threaten to damageany property owned by or in the possession or controlof the applicant Joan Rivers,and must not instruct,encourage or in any way suggest that any other person should do so.
This order shall be effective against the respondent Bluto Thuggo once it is personally served on him.
This order shall last until 26 July 2025 unless it is set aside or varied before then by an order of the court.
